0x2468DBE8.name: SET_TRAIN_DOOR_OPEN_RATIO

params.name: train
params.description: The train to set the door ratio for.

params.name: ratio
params.description: A value between 0.0 (fully closed) and 1.0 (fully open).

0x2468DBE8.description: Sets the ratio that a door is open for on a train.

examples.code:
-- open all doors on a train
local doorCount = GetTrainDoorCount(train)
for doorIndex = 0, doorCount - 1 do
    SetTrainDoorOpenRatio(train, doorIndex, 1.0)
end
